snippet: The body Denise Thiem was found after months of investigation and with the help of search dogs, helicopters and more than 300 police and military officers.
abstract: Body of American tourist Denise Thiem is found on farm along ancient Catholic pilgrimage route in near Astorga, Spain; authorities arrest property owner Miguel Angel Munoz Blas and stress that case is not indicative of increased danger of pilgrimage, which has become major tourism draw for area.
lead_paragraph: The body Denise Thiem was found after months of investigation and with the help of search dogs, helicopters and more than 300 police and military officers.

headline.main: Body of U.S. Tourist in Spain Is Found, and Arrest Is Made
headline.print_headline: Body of U.S. Tourist in Spain Is Found, and Arrest Is Made
